channel.title: Weapons disapearing
channel.description:
when i attack every weapon doesn't matter if its a whip or a bow or even a iron scim my item disapears when i attack an npc if anyone knows a fix please reply would be lots of help. it wasn't like this when i started coding the pi im using. i added in a custom whip and now all my items dissaper
can somone please repond and help me with my problem
